name: But Fear Itself
description:
A 3D retro first-person horror game, made for the Scream Lite jam of 2020!

But Fear Itself is a horror game about a lab, and the people who worked there. It's a horror game about the terror of being alone in a big, seemingly empty space. It's a horror game where the map is slightly tilted. It's a horror game about finding letters scattered around. It's a horror game about hoping that there's nothing hiding in the dark.

 I hope this type of horror works for you as well as it works for me
